column1: Here's the template with astrology-focused titles:
# [Planet Name] in All 12 Houses: Unlocking Astrological Insights
## The Significance of [Planet Name] in Vedic Astrology
## [Planet Name] in Each House: Key Influences
## Positive Aspects of [Planet Name] in Different Houses
## Negative Aspects of [Planet Name] in Different Houses
## Remedies to Balance [Planet Name] in Each House
## FAQs About [Planet Name] in Various Houses
This template is designed to help structure an astrology article focused on the influence of a planet across the 12 houses in a horoscope.
